fields.name: Green Mane Scarf
fields.description: A Mane Scarf, perfect for when your pet want to look fierce! Comes in a variety of sizes so all kinds can enjoy. Machine washable and a stretch fit for snug and comfortable use. Please check out our sizing guide for the perfect fit!

fields.name: Cat's Bowtie Harness
fields.description: The perfect fit for cats of any size, this harness is designed with comfort in mind. The padded chest-piece and soft fabric mean your cat will love wearing their harness on walks or supervised outdoor time! This harness secures with a buckle and has a handy D-ring for attaching a leash. You can also adjust the size of the harness using the straps for a more comfortable fit. The design is perfect for casual everyday use or special occassions.

fields.name: Checkered Dog Coat
fields.description: This coat is snuggly warm with a soft polar fleece lining and a water resistant layer inside. There is a slit on the back for a leash to connect with a harness underneath. The checkered design is a well-loved classic, and is perfect for everyday use. The coat fastens with a clasp under the belly, an adjustable strap allows for a perfect fit to keep away the cold breeze

fields.name: Leather Biker Jacket
fields.description: This is the perfect jacket for any biking enthusiast's pet! With the option to personalise with a pet's name, this jacket is not only cool, but very comfortable. Made with a PU leather outer layer and a smooth silk layer inside, your pet will be the most sytlish pet around. Simply choose the right size for your pet and get ready for the next bike meet!

fields.name: Yellow Beanie Hat
fields.description: This sweet little beanie is the perfect accessory to complete your pet's ensemble. The tie strings are made of soft material for the most comfortable fit.

fields.name: Red Beret Hat
fields.description: A great addition to your pet's wardrobe, this beret is both comfortable and stylish! The tie strings are made of soft material for the most comfortable fit.

fields.name: Red Satin Coat With Belt
fields.description: This stylish jacket is a perfect red carpet look. A red satin outerlayer with detailed gold buttons is lined with a cosy bland and white knit fabric inside. Toasty warm and fashionable!

fields.name: Blue Checkered Shirt
fields.description: A beautiful shirt designed to make your pet look their best! Mabe from a soft and durable cotton fabric, this shirt is designed to be comfortable during rest and playtime.

fields.name: Kitty Pattern Hoodie
fields.description: This hoodie may have a cat design on the hood but it can be mode for any kind of pet. A great casual addition to your pet's wardrobe, the soft cotton fabric is both warm and comfortable to wear

fields.name: Party Hat
fields.description: The perfect way to celebrate your pet's big day is with these gorgeous party hats. These hats have a satin covered cone and an adorable frill. A party just isn't a party without party hats!

fields.name: Freedom Neckerchief
fields.description: What better way to show off your pets' love for their freedom than with a neckerchief that shows off the Stars and Stripes?

fields.name: Patterned Red Hoodie
fields.description: This sport hoodie will suit any active pup! Made of a soft, breathable cotton fabric, this hoodie will excite and inspire anyone to get up and get active. CAUTION: May cause jealousy in others!

fields.name: Cute Pink Frilly Top
fields.description: This top is designed to be absolutely adorable! Made using a high quality cotton blend, this outfit is both breathable and cute. No one will be able to resist these pets!

fields.name: Black Chef Costume
fields.description: You pet will be cooking up a storm in this adorable chef's costume! This costumer is made using a fine cotton blend and clasp buttons. A wonderful outfit for Halloween or fancy dress parties!

fields.name: Adorable Pink Dress
fields.description: This dress is made from a light knit fabric with a light mesh skirt. This dress is an adorable addition to your pet's wardrobe and will make everyone you pass by go 'awww'!

fields.name: White Hoodie
fields.description: This cute hoodie is perfect for those chilly days when you want to look good! a smooth cotton blend with a fleece lining makes this the perfect cold weather outfit! Just make sure to avoid those muddy puddles!

fields.name: White and Black Butterfly Coat
fields.description: This stylish coat is made specially hot summer days, it is perfect for keeping your pet cool with it's ingenius design, this coat is made with a gel inner layer that can be put in the freezer and then put on your pet to keep them cool. The outerlayer is desinged to reflect the light and keep you pet cooler for longer.

fields.name: Red Beanie Hat
fields.description: A timeless classic. Red beanie's and denim jackets go together like peanut butter & jelly. Why not add this amazing accessory to your pet's wardrobe and see what other combo's you can find!

fields.name: Green Sleeveless Jacket
fields.description: A classic look that will make you friend's green with envy. This jacket is designed to be light and breathable and also very stylish! You could even pair this with an awesome tee or hat for a complete outfit.

fields.name: Sporty 'Woof' Hoodie
fields.description: This hoodie is made for sporty and fashionable pets. The bright yellow patterns and 'WOOF' logo all add up to make a wonderful outfit for any pet. You'll want to go that extra mile on a walk just to show off your pet in this hoodie!

fields.name: Banana Print Pyjamas Onesie
fields.description: Your pet will be all ready for a slumber party with this adorable onesie! Made a stretch cotton blend fabric, this outfit is perfect for you pet to sleep in, no matter how odd their sleeping position!

fields.name: 'Antisocial Puppy Club' Hoodie
fields.description: This hoodie is great for those strong independent pups who stand out from the crowd. Made of a warm and comfortable cotton blend, this hoodie is great for keeping the cold away.

fields.name: Simple Red And White Long-Sleeved Tee
fields.description: A simple but effective addition to any pet's wardrobe. This can be paired with a smart hoodie or maybe a cute beanie. The only limit is your imagination!

fields.name: Red White And Black Hoodie
fields.description: A stylish and sporty hoodie designed to impress. It's simple, no fuss design is perfect for those who appreciate a minimalist style. Made of a soft cotton blend, this hoodie is both warm and breathable.

fields.name: 'I Didn't Do It' Hoodie
fields.description: Designed with the mischief makers in mind, this hoodie is a great reminder of how cheeky our pet's can be. A soft cotton blend black fabric displays a broken teddy bear and the words 'I DIDN'T DO IT'

fields.name: The 'Night on the town' Evening Dress
fields.description: Lovely little dress with some beautiful details. There's space on the back for a harness ring to fit through, so it's just right for an evening out.

fields.name: The 'What's new Sherlock' flat cap and steel rim glasses.
fields.description: For those intelligent, discerning pets who are all about knowledge and the intelligent style.

fields.name: Funky Bowtie
fields.description: This cool bowtie gives your pet a spark of style and will create a buzz where ever they go!

fields.name: Autumnal light blouse with white detailing
fields.description: Great for those afternoon picnics, this top is ideal for those pets that enjoy a bit of cheese in the park on the weekends!

fields.name: Cat Cap
fields.description: Great for those cold winter nights. This cap has a fastener under the chin and is highly durable. This is ideal for outdoor cats who come back a bit chilly!

fields.name: Sports Jumper
fields.description: This jumper is designed to be tight-fitting and breathable. It has a water-resistant membrane to help your pet maintain a steady body temperature and resist chills from either the rain or bodies of water like puddles.

fields.name: Rain Hoody
fields.description: This water-proof hoody is light enough to keep your pet cool whilst keeping them dry. Great for those rainy days.

fields.name: Chunky Woolen Jumper
fields.description: This jumper is made from 100% wool. It's warm and is a great choice for short-haired pets, or just pets that feel the cold, during the winter.

fields.name: Casual Leather Jacket with Hood
fields.description: This jacket is for those more casual pets. It has a thick leather outer layer for protection, with a stylish cotton hood to simply look cool.

fields.name: Cozy Woolen Jumper
fields.description: Baggy woolen jumper with a fold-down neck and stretchy short arms, ideal for those cooler walks.

fields.name: Button-up Light Pajamas
fields.description: Designed for those early Spring/late Autumn nights to keep your fur-baby nice and toasty.

fields.name: Pull-up PJs
fields.description: Lycra-style PJs that simply pull up your pets legs and keep their belly warm!

fields.name: Frilly Victorian Dress
fields.description: For those pets that were born into the wrong Century!

fields.name: The Tux Look
fields.description: Perfect for those special occasions.

fields.name: 'The Bumble Bee' Costume
fields.description: For those nights that your pet just wants to buzz around.

fields.name: Flower Collar
fields.description: Great for weddings, or any event that your pet needs to get dressed up for!

fields.name: Speedster Jumpsuit
fields.description: A cover-all jumpsuit for those faster-than-fast pets.

fields.name: Thermal Hoody
fields.description: Fluffy on the inside, protective on the outside; this jacket is the best of both worlds for your pet. It's warm and snuggly, whilst being padded and having an external water-resistant membrane.

fields.name: Prom Dress
fields.description: Ideal for those nights out and those fancy evenings.

fields.name: The Tartan Jumper
fields.description: Beautiful light jumper that is designed to pop and make your pet look great!

fields.name: Multi-coloured Tutu
fields.description: A beautiful, colourful tutu for those prancing pets.

fields.name: Informal Shirt
fields.description: A light short-sleeved shirt with a button up front and a softened collar.

fields.name: Spongebob Vest
fields.description: A light vest for all of the Spongebob fans!

fields.name: Santa Outfit
fields.description: For the Christmas Party!

fields.name: Branded Hoody
fields.description: Have a favourite brand that you want your pet to share? This hoody is ideal! We can put any name that you want, in our specialised font, across the hood.

fields.name: Present Collar
fields.description: A small collar with a little present box on it. Good for holidays, Christmas, and special days. You can even put a small something into the present, like a ring!

fields.name: Elf Outfit
fields.description: Perfect for Santa's Little Helper!

fields.name: Fast Food is the Vest
fields.description: For pets that are obsessed with fast food! It's a light vest that can be worn any time.

fields.name: Chequered Rain Coat
fields.description: Great for those walks in the rain. Warm and stylish.

fields.name: Striped T-Shirt
fields.description: A nice little t-shirt, striped and casual for those park days.

fields.name: Super Pet Costume
fields.description: Turn your pet into a superhero!
